ApplicationSummary: This application is designed for tweeting during a presentation by speaker oneself.
ApplicationSummary_Step3: Tap to tweet the message that was reserved during your presentation!
Guide_in_Home: Open menu and click "Edit..." to reserve messages to tweet after.
Guide_in_Edit: Click "Add" to reserve a new message to tweet after.
Confirm_DiscardChanges:
The message text has changed.
Are you sure you want to discard this change?
Confirm_DeleteTweets:
Delete selected tweets.
Are you sure?
